page.name: Helping Students Increase their Writing Fluency: Giving Students Voice through Bio-Poems and Collaborative Paragraphs (Video)
page.intro: Research informs us that, to help students become less intimidated by and more comfortable with writing, we need to increase the amount of writing they do. Some strategies used to build writing fluency represent examples of student-centered learning principles in that they engage learners in collaborative activities and allow them choice in topics to write about, effectively giving them voice in the selection of materials and strategies.
